ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
Things have gone south and the Goon's got himself in deep this time. The G-men have taken the opportunity to kick Goon while he's down and haul him off to Cade's Island Penitentiary to rot for the rest of his days. Now it's up to Franky to plan a daring prison break and spring the Goon before he finds himself out-numbered on the wrong end of an all-out prison brawl with a load of old foes.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 08:43:14. [CVDB110219]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/the-goon-13/4000-110219/

ComicInfo.Penciller: Eric Powell, Eric Powell, Eric Powell
ComicInfo.Characters: Bill Mudd, Charlotte, Dr. Alloy, Franky, Mudd, Nicky Fin, Old Lady McGreg, Peewee, Smitty, Specs, The Goon, Tispy Kiligan, Warden Hagenbeck, Willie Nagel
ComicInfo.Locations: Cade's Island Maximum Security Prison, The McGreg Home for Illegitimate, Wayward, and Possibly Homicidal Youth
